$(function(){
    var flag;
    $("a.a4,.head16_nav").hover(function(){
        clearTimeout(flag);
        $(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '299px'}, "fast");

        $('a.a4').css('background-position', '-124px 0');

        },100);
    });
});

function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle){
    try { window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);}
    catch (e) 
    { 
        try { window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, ""); } 
        catch (e) { alert("¼ÓÈëÊÕ²ØÊ§°Ü£¬ÇëÊ¹ÓÃCtrl+D½øÐÐÌí¼Ó"); } 
    } 
    return false;
}

	$_sso.logout();
}

function json_api_login_form(){
	$_sso.show_login_form();
}

		<script>
            $(function(){
                var lazyheight = 0;
                //°ó¶¨ÊÂ¼þ
                $(window).bind("scroll", function(){
                    lazyheight = parseFloat($(window).height()) + parseFloat($(window).scrollTop());
                    //ÓÒ²à¸ß¶È
                    var rightDivHeight = $("#rightDiv").height();
                    /**ÏòÏÂ¹ö¶¯*/
                    if ($(document).height()-200-parseFloat($(".includeGlobalFoot").height()) <= lazyheight) {
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_fixed");
                        $("#rightDiv").addClass("side_abso");
                    }
                    //´°¿Ú¸ß¶È ´óÓÚ ÓÒ²à ¸ß¶ÈÊ± ÓÒ²àÍ£Ö¹
                    else if(lazyheight > 100+rightDivHeight) {
                        //alert('ÓÒ²àÍ£Ö¹¹ö¶¯');
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_abso");
                        $("#rightDiv").addClass("side_fixed");
                    }
                    else if(parseFloat($(window).scrollTop()) <= parseFloat($("#rightDiv").height())-parseFloat($(window).height())+100) {
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_abso");
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_fixed");
                    }
                });
            })
            function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle) {
                try {
                    window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);
                } catch (e) {
                    try {
                        window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, "");
                    } catch (e) {
                        alert("ÄúµÄä¯ÀÀÆ÷²»Ö§³ÖÒ»¼üÊÕ²Ø£¬Çë°´Ctrl+D½«±¾Ò³Ìí¼Óµ½ÊÕ²Ø¼Ð");
                    }
                }
            }


            function myswitch(t,b,id,len){
                for(i=1;i<=len;i++){
                    document.getElementById(t+"_"+i).className='';
                    document.getElementById(b+"_"+i).style.display='none';
                }
                document.getElementById(t+"_"+id).className='current ';
                document.getElementById(b+"_"+id).style.display='';
            }
            $('.showFocus li').mouseover(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').show();
                return false;
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').hide();
                return false;
            })
            $('.new15Theme li').mouseover(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').show();
                return false;
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').hide();
                return false;
            })
		</script>

  $(window).bind("scroll", function(){
	var xh=$(window).scrollTop();
	if(xh>700){
		$(".fd_div").fadeIn();
	 }else{
		$(".fd_div").fadeOut();
	}
  });

	document.getElementById('SOHUCS').scrollIntoView();

	<script>
	function addGameName(){
		var typename = $('#hidd_name').val()+' ';
		var q_val = typename+$('#q').val();

<script>
//µ÷È¡µ±Ç°ÓÎÏ·½ñÌìµÄËùÓÐ¿ª·þ
				$.getJSON('http://kf.07073.com/kfapi/kf_interface/gameBoxKfList/?callback=?', {'name_id' : 40472}, function (data) {
			        var ing = '', not = '', yes='', will='',limit=4;
			        if(data.kfIng != ""){
			        	ing=data.kfIng;
			        }
			        if(data.kfNot != ""){
			        	not=data.kfNot;
			        }
			        if(data.kfYes != ""){//ÒÑ¾­¿ª·þ
			        	yes=data.kfYes;
			        }
			        if(data.kfWill != ""){//Á½¸öÐ¡Ê±Ö®ºóµÄÒÔºóµÄ¿ª·þ
			        	will=data.kfWill;
			        }
			        var hb="";
			        if(ing!=""){
			        	for (var i in ing) {
			        		if(i>3){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = ing[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				            hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            i++;
				        }
			        }

			        var los=limit-ing.length;
			        //console.log(los);
			        if(not!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in not) {
				            if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = not[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }
			        if(yes!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in yes) {
				            if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = yes[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }
			        if(will!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in will) {
			        		if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = will[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }

			        if(hb.length==0){
			        	$("#indexkf").hide();
			        }else{
			        	$(".kf_main").html(hb);
			        }
			    })



function timeformat(timeStr)
{
var tim =  new Date(parseInt(timeStr) * 1000); //Èç¹ûÊ±¼ä´ÁÊÇºó¶ËÉú³É Òª * 1000
var year = tim.getFullYear(); //Äê
var month = tim.getMonth() + 1; //ÔÂ
month = month < 10 ? '0' + month : month;
var day = tim.getDate();//ÈÕ
day = day < 10 ? '0' + day : day;
var h = tim.getHours()+1;
h = h < 10 ? '0' + h : h;
var mm = tim.getMinutes()+1;
mm = mm < 10 ? '0' + mm : mm;
var s = tim.getSeconds()+1;
s = s < 10 ? '0' + s : s;
str=month+'-'+day;
return str;
}
	</script>

        <script>
        ba1_index = 2;
        page_size = 8;
		var show_all = 0;
        $('#ba1').click(function(){
          ba1_num = $('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').length;     
          if(!show_all){
			$('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').show();
			$('#ba1 > img').attr('src', 'http://m1.073img.com/_12img/typeC/arrow_up.png');
			show_all = 1;
          } else {
			$('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').slice(ba1_index*page_size).hide();
			$('#ba1 > img').attr('src', 'http://m1.073img.com/_12img/typeC/arrow.png');
			show_all = 0;
          }
        });

		
        $('.thisSelectByType a').click(function(){
          type = $(this).parent().attr('rel');
          expr = type+':'+$(this).html();
          $('#daShow_1 > dl').attr('isshow','').hide();
        
          $(this).parent().find('a').removeClass('current');
          $(this).addClass('current');
          //´¦Àí¶àÌõ¼þ
          multi_expr = 'dl';
          $('.thisSelectByType dl').each(function(){
              sexpr = $(this).find("a[class='current']").html();
              if(sexpr != 'È«²¿'){
                  stype = $(this).find('dd').attr('rel');
                  multi_expr += "[rel*='"+stype+":'][rel*='"+sexpr+"']";
              }
          });
          //console.log(multi_expr);
          $('#daShow_1').find(multi_expr).attr('isshow','1');
          
          //´¦Àí·ÖÒ³
          if($('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').length>16){
              $('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').slice(0,16).show();
              $('div.arrow').show();
          } else {
              $('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').show();
              $('div.arrow').hide();
          }
        });
        </script>

<script>
	var isLogin = 0;
	var typeid = '40472';
	$.get('/plus/typec_serv.php?action=load_game_state&typeid='+typeid,function(data){
		data = eval('('+data+')');

		if(data.kf>0){
			$('.link_01').html('<a class="this_bgimg a2" href="http://kf.07073.com/g_'+typeid+'/?f=zq" target="_blank">¿ª·þ</a>');
		}
	});
	function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle)
	{
		if(!isLogin){
			json_api_login_form();
			return false;
		}
		try
		{
			var d = document;
			var ta=d.createElement("script");
			ta.type="text/javascript";
			ta.id="fav";
			ta.setAttribute("charset","gb2312");
			ta.src="http://ui1.07073.com/api/fav_game/"+typeid;
			d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(ta);
			window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);
		} catch (e) {
			try {
				window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, "");
			} catch (e) {
				alert("ÄúµÄä¯ÀÀÆ÷²»Ö§³ÖÒ»¼üÊÕ²Ø£¬Çë°´Ctrl+D½«±¾Ò³Ìí¼Óµ½ÊÕ²Ø¼Ð.");
			}
		}
	}

	function funcName(flag){
		if(flag == 1){
			isLogin = 1;
		}else{
			isLogin = 0;
		}
	}
</script>

	$.getJSON('http://kf.07073.com/kfapi/kf_interface/getTodayList/?callback=?', {'name_id' : 40472}, function (data) {
		var html = '', style = '', info;
		for (var i in data) {

		}

	});
	function sta(){

		},function(){

		})
	}

function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle){
    try { window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);}
    catch (e) 
    { 
        try { window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, ""); } 
        catch (e) { alert("¼ÓÈëÊÕ²ØÊ§°Ü£¬ÇëÊ¹ÓÃCtrl+D½øÐÐÌí¼Ó"); } 
    } 
    return false;
}

		<script>
            $(function(){
                var lazyheight = 0;
                //°ó¶¨ÊÂ¼þ
                $(window).bind("scroll", function(){
                    lazyheight = parseFloat($(window).height()) + parseFloat($(window).scrollTop());
                    //ÓÒ²à¸ß¶È
                    var rightDivHeight = $("#rightDiv").height();
                    /**ÏòÏÂ¹ö¶¯*/
                    if ($(document).height()-200-parseFloat($(".includeGlobalFoot").height()) <= lazyheight) {
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_fixed");
                        $("#rightDiv").addClass("side_abso");
                    }
                    //´°¿Ú¸ß¶È ´óÓÚ ÓÒ²à ¸ß¶ÈÊ± ÓÒ²àÍ£Ö¹
                    else if(lazyheight > 100+rightDivHeight) {
                        //alert('ÓÒ²àÍ£Ö¹¹ö¶¯');
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_abso");
                        $("#rightDiv").addClass("side_fixed");
                    }
                    else if(parseFloat($(window).scrollTop()) <= parseFloat($("#rightDiv").height())-parseFloat($(window).height())+100) {
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_abso");
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_fixed");
                    }
                });
            })
            function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle) {
                try {
                    window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);
                } catch (e) {
                    try {
                        window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, "");
                    } catch (e) {
                        alert("ÄúµÄä¯ÀÀÆ÷²»Ö§³ÖÒ»¼üÊÕ²Ø£¬Çë°´Ctrl+D½«±¾Ò³Ìí¼Óµ½ÊÕ²Ø¼Ð");
                    }
                }
            }


            function myswitch(t,b,id,len){
                for(i=1;i<=len;i++){
                    document.getElementById(t+"_"+i).className='';
                    document.getElementById(b+"_"+i).style.display='none';
                }
                document.getElementById(t+"_"+id).className='current ';
                document.getElementById(b+"_"+id).style.display='';
            }
            $('.showFocus li').mouseover(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').show();
                return false;
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').hide();
                return false;
            })
            $('.new15Theme li').mouseover(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').show();
                return false;
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').hide();
                return false;
            })

<script>
//µ÷È¡µ±Ç°ÓÎÏ·½ñÌìµÄËùÓÐ¿ª·þ
				$.getJSON('http://kf.07073.com/kfapi/kf_interface/gameBoxKfList/?callback=?', {'name_id' : 40472}, function (data) {
			        var ing = '', not = '', yes='', will='',limit=4;
			        if(data.kfIng != ""){
			        	ing=data.kfIng;
			        }
			        if(data.kfNot != ""){
			        	not=data.kfNot;
			        }
			        if(data.kfYes != ""){//ÒÑ¾­¿ª·þ
			        	yes=data.kfYes;
			        }
			        if(data.kfWill != ""){//Á½¸öÐ¡Ê±Ö®ºóµÄÒÔºóµÄ¿ª·þ
			        	will=data.kfWill;
			        }
			        var hb="";
			        if(ing!=""){
			        	for (var i in ing) {
			        		if(i>3){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = ing[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				            hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            i++;
				        }
			        }

			        var los=limit-ing.length;
			        //console.log(los);
			        if(not!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in not) {
				            if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = not[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }
			        if(yes!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in yes) {
				            if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = yes[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }
			        if(will!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in will) {
			        		if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = will[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }

			        if(hb.length==0){
			        	$("#indexkf").hide();
			        }else{
			        	$(".kf_main").html(hb);
			        }
			    })



function timeformat(timeStr)
{
var tim =  new Date(parseInt(timeStr) * 1000); //Èç¹ûÊ±¼ä´ÁÊÇºó¶ËÉú³É Òª * 1000
var year = tim.getFullYear(); //Äê
var month = tim.getMonth() + 1; //ÔÂ
month = month < 10 ? '0' + month : month;
var day = tim.getDate();//ÈÕ
day = day < 10 ? '0' + day : day;
var h = tim.getHours()+1;
h = h < 10 ? '0' + h : h;
var mm = tim.getMinutes()+1;
mm = mm < 10 ? '0' + mm : mm;
var s = tim.getSeconds()+1;
s = s < 10 ? '0' + s : s;
str=month+'-'+day;
return str;
}
	</script>

        <script>
        ba1_index = 2;
        page_size = 8;
		var show_all = 0;
        $('#ba1').click(function(){
          ba1_num = $('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').length;     
          if(!show_all){
			$('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').show();
			$('#ba1 > img').attr('src', 'http://m1.073img.com/_12img/typeC/arrow_up.png');
			show_all = 1;
          } else {
			$('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').slice(ba1_index*page_size).hide();
			$('#ba1 > img').attr('src', 'http://m1.073img.com/_12img/typeC/arrow.png');
			show_all = 0;
          }
        });

		
        $('.thisSelectByType a').click(function(){
          type = $(this).parent().attr('rel');
          expr = type+':'+$(this).html();
          $('#daShow_1 > dl').attr('isshow','').hide();
        
          $(this).parent().find('a').removeClass('current');
          $(this).addClass('current');
          //´¦Àí¶àÌõ¼þ
          multi_expr = 'dl';
          $('.thisSelectByType dl').each(function(){
              sexpr = $(this).find("a[class='current']").html();
              if(sexpr != 'È«²¿'){
                  stype = $(this).find('dd').attr('rel');
                  multi_expr += "[rel*='"+stype+":'][rel*='"+sexpr+"']";
              }
          });
          //console.log(multi_expr);
          $('#daShow_1').find(multi_expr).attr('isshow','1');
          
          //´¦Àí·ÖÒ³
          if($('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').length>16){
              $('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').slice(0,16).show();
              $('div.arrow').show();
          } else {
              $('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').show();
              $('div.arrow').hide();
          }
        });
        </script>

<script>
	var isLogin = 0;
	var typeid = '40472';
	$.get('/plus/typec_serv.php?action=load_game_state&typeid='+typeid,function(data){
		data = eval('('+data+')');

		if(data.kf>0){
			$('.link_01').html('<a class="this_bgimg a2" href="http://kf.07073.com/g_'+typeid+'/?f=zq" target="_blank">¿ª·þ</a>');
		}
	});
	function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle)
	{
		if(!isLogin){
			json_api_login_form();
			return false;
		}
		try
		{
			var d = document;
			var ta=d.createElement("script");
			ta.type="text/javascript";
			ta.id="fav";
			ta.setAttribute("charset","gb2312");
			ta.src="http://ui1.07073.com/api/fav_game/"+typeid;
			d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(ta);
			window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);
		} catch (e) {
			try {
				window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, "");
			} catch (e) {
				alert("ÄúµÄä¯ÀÀÆ÷²»Ö§³ÖÒ»¼üÊÕ²Ø£¬Çë°´Ctrl+D½«±¾Ò³Ìí¼Óµ½ÊÕ²Ø¼Ð.");
			}
		}
	}

	function funcName(flag){
		if(flag == 1){
			isLogin = 1;
		}else{
			isLogin = 0;
		}
	}
</script>

<script>
	$.getJSON('http://kf.07073.com/kfapi/kf_interface/getTodayList/?callback=?', {'name_id' : 40472}, function (data) {
		var html = '', style = '', info;
		for (var i in data) {
			if(i>9){
				style = 'display:none;';
			}
			info = data[i];

			html +='<tr class="trli" style="'+style+'" data-info="'+ info.thread +'"><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80"><div><a href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/' + info.id + '?f=zq" class="name" target="_blank">' + info.name + '</a></div></td><td align="center"><a href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/' + info.id + '?f=zq" target="_blank">' + info.begin_time + '</a></td><td align="center" width="88"><div><a href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/' + info.id + '?f=zq" target="_blank">' + info.thread + '</a></div></td></tr>';
		}

		$('#kf_list_tr table').html(html);
		sta();
	});
	function sta(){
		$("#kf_list_tr tr.trli").hover(function(){
			$(this).children('td:last').children('div').children('a').html('¿ªÊ¼ÓÎÏ·');
		},function(){
			$(this).children('td:last').children('div').children('a').html($(this).attr('data-info'));
		})
	}

</script>

		<script type="text/javascript">
		
			$(function(){
				$(".alert b").click(function(){
					$(this).parents(".alert").hide();
				})
			})
			
			var $backToTopEle = $('.backToTop');
			var isIE = $.browser.msie;
			var isIE6 = isIE && $.browser.version == '6.0';
			var isIE7 = isIE && $.browser.version == '7.0';
			backToTopFun = function() {
				var _wt = document.body.clientWidth;
				var _bw = $('wyyx-con').width();
				
				var st = $(document).scrollTop(), winh = $(window).height();
				$backToTopEle.css('right', ((_wt-_bw)/2)-540);			
				if (isIE6) {
					$backToTopEle.css("top", st + winh - 500);
				}
				
				if (isIE7) {
					$backToTopEle.css('right', ((_wt-_bw)/2)-539);
				}
				
				$backToTopEle.show();
			};
			$(window).bind("scroll", backToTopFun).bind('resize', backToTopFun);
			$(function() { backToTopFun(); });
			
			
			//ÈÃIEÖ§³ÖPlaceholder
			function isPlaceholder() {
			    var input = document.createElement('input');
			    return 'placeholder' in input;
			}
			
			if (!isPlaceholder()) {//²»Ö§³Öplaceholder ÓÃjqueryÀ´Íê³É
		        if (!isPlaceholder()) {
		            $("input").not("input[type='password']").each(//°Ñinput°ó¶¨ÊÂ¼þ ÅÅ³ýpassword¿ò
		            function() {
		                if ($(this).val() == "" && $(this).attr("placeholder") != "") {
		                    $(this).val($(this).attr("placeholder"));
		                    $(this).focus(function() {
		                        if ($(this).val() == $(this).attr("placeholder"))
		                            $(this).val("");
		                    });
		                    $(this).blur(function() {
		                        if ($(this).val() == "")
		                            $(this).val($(this).attr("placeholder"));
		                    });
		                }
		            });
		        }
			}
			
			
		</script>
        
        
    <script>
		$(function(){
			gethot();
			getmore(0);
		})
		
		$('#more').live('click',function(){
			 k = $('#list').find("li").size(); 
			 getmore(k);
		})
	
		$('.btn').click(function(){
			  key = $.trim($('.search').val());
			  search_n(key); 
		})
		function gethot(){
			$.getJSON('http://www.07073.com/plus/zt/index.php?model=201410yygj&f=hot&r'+Math.random(),function(data){
				var sg = '';
				$.each(data,function(key, val){
				  sg +=  '<li><div onclick="search_n(\''+ val['gname'] +'\')" class="w-112"><a href="javascript:;"><img src="'+ val['pic'] +'"/></a><p class="ie6png"><a href="javascript:;">'+ val['gname'] +'¹¤¾ß´óÈ«</a></p></div></li>';  
				});
				
				$("#hot").html(sg);
			  });
		}
		
		function getmore(p){
			$.getJSON('http://www.07073.com/plus/zt/index.php?model=201410yygj&f=more&r'+Math.random(),{p:p},function(data){
				if(data == null){
					$("#more").html("Ã»ÓÐ¸ü¶àÁË");
					return false;
				}
				var sg = '';
				$.each(data,function(key, val){
				  sg += '<li><div class="gj-img"><img src="'+ val['litpic'] +'"/></div><div class="gj-text"><h3><a  target="_blank" href="'+ val['arcurl'] +'">'+ val['title'] +'</a></h3><p>'+ val['description'] +'</p></div></li>';  
				});
				$("#list").append(sg);
			  });
		}
		
		function search_n(key){
			$('.alert').find("label").html(key);
			$('.alert').hide();
			$('#win2').show();
			sg = '';
			$.ajax({
				  url: "http://www.07073.com/plus/zt/index.php?model=201410yygj&f=search_k",
				  type: "GET",
				  data: {k:key},
				  dataType:'json',
				  success:function(json){
					 $('.alert').find("i").html(json.num);
					 if(json == -1){
						$('#win3').show();
						$('#win2').hide();
					 }else{
						$.each(json['data'],function(key, val){
						     sg += '<li><a target="_blank" href="'+ val['arcurl'] +'"><img src="'+ val['litpic'] +'"/></a><p><a target="_blank" href="'+ val['arcurl'] +'">'+ val['title'] +'</a></p></li>';  
						});
					 $('#searchlist').html(sg);
					 $('#win1').show();
					 $('#win2').hide();
				     }
			     }
			})
		}
     </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//¶¨ÒåÈ«¾Ö±äÁ¿
var Total = 8;
var _TasteArray = '';//³õ²½´æ´¢Ñ¡Ïî

$(document).ready(function($){
	
	$('.click_btn').click(function(){
		$('.thisBlackShadow').show();
		$('.thisBlackShadow').height($(document).height());
		$('.thisBigBoxing').slideDown(200);
	})

	$('.thisClose').click(function(){
		$('.thisBlackShadow').hide();
		$('.thisBigBoxing').slideUp(200);
	})
	//ÉÏÒ»Ò³  ÎªÁËÕûºÏÑ¡ÖÐÑùÊ½¸ÄÎªÕâÖÖ·½Ê½
	$('.thisPrevNext ul').on('click','#prePage',function(){
		var num = $(this).attr('data');//µ±Ç°ÏîË÷Òý
		if(num == 0){
			alert('ÒÑ¾­ÊÇµÚÒ»Ïî');
			return false;
		}else{
			var preNum = parseInt(num)-1;
			getItem(preNum);
		}
	});
	//ÏÂÒ»Ò³  ÎªÁËÕûºÏÑ¡ÖÐÑùÊ½¸ÄÎªÕâÖÖ·½Ê½
	$('.thisPrevNext ul').on('click','#nextPage',function(){
		var num = $(this).attr('data');//µ±Ç°ÏîË÷Òý
		if(num == parseInt(Total)-1){
			alert('ÒÑ¾­ÊÇ×îºóÒ»Ïî');
			return false;
		}else{
			var flag = false;
			$('.thisMain720').find('.selectBox ').find('.item_'+num).each(function(){
				var cur_class = $(this).find('a').attr('class');
				if(cur_class == 'current'){
					flag = true;
					return false;
				}
			});
			if(!flag){
				alert('ÕâµÀÌâÄú»¹ÊÇ×öÒ»¸öÑ¡Ôñ°É');
				return false;
			}else{
				var nextNum = parseInt(num)+1;
				getItem(nextNum);
			}
			
		}
	});
	//½»¾í ÎªÁËÕûºÏÑ¡ÖÐÑùÊ½¸ÄÎªÕâÖÖ·½Ê½
	$('.thisPrevNext ul').on('click','#subTest',function(){
		var num = $(this).attr('data');
		var flag = false;
		$('.item_'+num).each(function(){
			var cur_class = $(this).find('a').attr('class');
			if(cur_class == 'current'){
				flag = true;
				return false;
			}
		});
		if(!flag){
			alert('ÕâµÀÌâÄú»¹ÊÇ×öÒ»¸öÑ¡Ôñ°É');
			return false;
		}
		if(_TasteArray){
			$.ajax({
				 type: "POST",
				 url:  "http://zhao.07073.com/newgame/getTasteRes",
				 data: {check_items:_TasteArray},
				 dataType:'json',
				 success: function(data){
				   if(data.status == 1){
					   $('.thisMain720').html(data.msg);
					   $('.thisContents h3').html('²âÊÔ½á¹û');
					   $('.thisPrevNext ul .fr').html('<a href="javascript:;" id="resetPage">ÖØÐÂ²âÊÔ &gt;</a>');
				   }else{
					   alert(data.msg);
				   }
				 }
			  });
		}else{
			alert('ÇëÖÁÉÙ×öÒ»¸öÑ¡Ôñ£¬ÎÒÃÇ²ÅÄÜÖªµÀÄãÊÊºÏÄÄÐ©ÓÎÏ·');
		}
	});
	//ÖØÐÂ¿ªÊ¼
	$('.thisPrevNext ul').on('click','#resetPage',function(){
		getItem(0);
	});

	
});

//¼ÇÂ¼Ñ¡ÏîÖµ
function checkItem(cur_item,cur_num){
	$('.item_'+cur_num).find('dt a').each(function(){
		$(this).removeClass('current');
	});
	$(cur_item).addClass('current');
	var taste_tips = $(cur_item).parent().prev().html();
	if(_TasteArray == ''){
		_TasteArray += taste_tips;
	}else{
		_TasteArray += '@@'+taste_tips;
	}
	
}
function getItem(num_index){
	$.ajax({
		 type: "get",
		 url:  "http://zhao.07073.com/newgame/getTasteQues",
		 data: {p:num_index},
		 dataType:'json',
		 success: function(data){
		   if(data.status == 1){
			   var q = data.q;
			   $('.thisContents h3').html(q.gtitle);
			   $('.thisMain720').html(q.item);
			   $('.thisPrevNext ul').html(q.bottom);
			   $('.thisPages p').html(q.page);
		   }else{
			   alert(data.msg);
		   }
		}
	  });
}
//¿ªÊ¼²âÊÔ
function start(){
	$('.thisContents').show();
	$('#thisCover').hide();
	getItem(0);
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	var islogin = '';
	function _login(){
		json_api_login_form();return false;
	}
	function funcName(flag, userInfo){
		islogin = flag;
		if(!islogin){
			$('.xt2').bind('click', _login);
		}else{
			$('.xt2').unbind('click',_login);
		}
	}
	var _scroll_flag = true;//·ÀÖ¹¼ÓÔØÂýµ¼ÖÂµÄÊý¾ÝÖØ¸´
	function scrollEvent()
	{
		var a = arguments[0] ? arguments[0] : 0;
		var xh=$(window).scrollTop();
		
		if(xh>500){
			$(".tzss_1 a").fadeIn();
		 }else{
			$(".tzss_1 a").fadeOut();
		}
		
		if((xh >= $(document).height() - $(window).height() || a == 1) && _scroll_flag)
		{
			_scroll_flag = false;
			$(window).unbind('scroll',scrollEvent);
			var go_str = $('#pages a').attr('src');
			if(go_str.indexOf("?") == -1){
				var gourl = go_str;
			}else{
				go_str = go_str.match(/(.*)\?/).toString();
				go_arr = go_str.split(",");
				var gourl = go_arr[1];
			}
			var act = $('#act').val();
			var smtd = $('#smtd').val();
			var gname = $("input[name='gname']").val();
			gname = gname=='' || gname=='ÓÎÏ·Ãû³ÆËÑË÷' ? '':'&gname='+gname;
			var page = parseInt($('#curPage').val())+20;
			
			/* if(act == 'time' && smtd == 0){
				var page = $('.thisTimeGameList .timeLine').last().val();
			} */
			$('#loading').show();
			$.ajax({
				type: "get",
				dataType: "json",
				url: gourl,
				data: "reqs=1&act="+act+"&smtd="+smtd+gname+"&page="+page,
				success: function(data){
					if(smtd == 0){
						var add_postion = ".thisTimeGameList .gameListCont";
					}else{
						var add_postion = ".thisHotGameList";
					}
					$(add_postion).append(data.html);
					$('#curPage').val(data.curPage);
					if((data.nums < 20 && (data.smtd == 1 || data.smtd == 0 && data.act == 'hot') || data.status == 0) ){
						$('#loading').hide();
						$(window).unbind('scroll',scrollEvent);	
					}
					else{
						$(window).bind('scroll', scrollEvent);
					}						
					_scroll_flag = true;
				}
			});
		}			
	}		
	$(document).ready(function(){
		if(20 > 19 || ('hot' != 'hot' && 0 == 0)){
			$(window).bind('scroll', scrollEvent);
			$(".tzss_1 a").hide();
		}
		else{
			$('#loading').hide();
		}
	});
	function clear_check(){
		$('#cur_check').empty();
		window.location.href="http://zhao.07073.com/";
	}
	function GameOrderBy(parm){
		var str = "http://zhao.07073.com/0-0-17-0-0";
		if(str.indexOf("?") == -1){
			var new_url = str+"?act="+parm;
		}else{
			arr = str.match(/(.*)\?/).toString();
			arr = arr.split(",");
			var new_url = arr[1]+"?act="+parm+"&gname=&smtd=0";
		}
		window.location.href=new_url;
	}
	function showView(smtd){
		var method_str = "http://zhao.07073.com/0-0-17-0-0";
		if(method_str.indexOf("?") == -1){
			var new_url = method_str+"?smtd="+smtd;
		}else{
			arr = method_str.match(/(.*)\?/).toString();
			arr = arr.split(",");
			var new_url = arr[1]+"?act=hot&gname=&smtd="+smtd;
		}
		window.location.href=new_url;
	}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(function(){
    var flag;
    $("a.a4,.head16_nav").hover(function(){
        clearTimeout(flag);
        $(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '299px'}, "fast");
    	$('a.a4').css('background-position', '-124px -44px');
    },function(){
        $('a.a4').css('background-position', '-124px 0');
        flag = setTimeout(function(){
    		$(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '0px'}, "fast");
        },100);
    });
});
//¼ÓÈëÊÕ²Ø
function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle){
    try { window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);}
    catch (e) 
    { 
        try { window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, ""); } 
        catch (e) { alert("¼ÓÈëÊÕ²ØÊ§°Ü£¬ÇëÊ¹ÓÃCtrl+D½øÐÐÌí¼Ó"); } 
    } 
    return false;
}

var $_sso = new SSO({anno_ele : '.head16_main' , anno_cell : '.head16_main_ul_div ul', anno_bigpic : '.head16_main_ul_div_img'});

function json_logout(){
	$_sso.logout();
}

function json_api_login_form(){
	$_sso.show_login_form();
}

	<script type="text/javascript">
	//»ñÈ¡µ±Ç°ÎÄÕÂËùÔÚÀ¸Ä¿ÊÇ·ñ¾ßÓÐ¶©ÔÄ¹¦ÄÜ
    var tid=14752;
  $(function(){
    flag();
    
  })
  //»ñÈ¡×´Ì¬
  function flag(){
  
  if(tid!=0){
      $.get('/plus/zt/index.php?model=dingyue&f=flag',{'tid':tid},function(data){
        if(data==0){//Î´¿ªÆô
          clearAll();
        }

        if(data==1){//ÒÑ¶©ÔÄ
          $("#qxdy").show();
        }
        if(data==-1 || data==-2){//Î´¶©ÔÄ or Î´µÇÂ¼
          $("#dingyue").show();
        }

        $("#flag").val(data);
      })
    }else{//Î´¿ªÆô
      clearAll();
    }
  }
  $("#dingyue").click(function(){
    var flag=$("#flag").val();
    if(flag==-1 || flag==-2){
      //ÅÐ¶ÏÊÇ·ñµÇÂ¼
      $.get('/plus/zt/index.php?model=dingyue&f=clickdy',function(data){
        if(data!=-2){//ÒÑµÇÂ¼
      $("#email").val(data);
          $("#WinWrapper1").show();
        }else{
          json_api_login_form();
          return false;
        }
      })
      
    } 
  })
  
  //¶©ÔÄÌá½»
  $("#dyqd").click(function(){
    //»ñÈ¡tid
    if(tid>0){
      //»ñÈ¡email²¢ÑéÖ¤¸ñÊ½
      var reg =/^([a-zA-Z0-9_\.])+@([a-zA-Z0-9_-])+(\.([a-zA-Z0-9_]+))+$/;
      var email=$("#email").val();
    
      if(email!="" && email.length<=50 && reg.test(email)){
        var url=window.location.href;
        $.post('/plus/zt/index.php?model=dingyue&f=add',{'tid':tid,'email':email,'url':url},function(data){
        if(data==-2){//Î´µÇÂ¼
          json_api_login_form();
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else if(data==0){
          alert("¸ÃÀ¸Ä¿Î´¿ªÆô¶©ÔÄ¹¦ÄÜ");
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else if(data==-1){
          alert("ÄúÒÑ¾­¶©ÔÄ¹ý¸ÃÀ¸Ä¿");
          $("#flag").val("1");
          $("#dingyue").hide();
          $("#qxdy").show();
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else if(data==-3){
          alert("ÓÊÏäÒÑÔÚµ±Ç°À¸Ä¿Ê¹ÓÃ¹ý");
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else if(data==-4){
          alert("´íÎóµÄ²ÎÊý");
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else{
          $("#WinWrapper2").show();
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
        }
      })
      }else{
        alert("ÇëÌîÐ´ÕýÈ·µÄÓÊÏäµØÖ·");
        return false;
      }
    }
  })
  //È¡Ïû¶©ÔÄ
  $("#qxdy").click(function(){
    var flag=$("#flag").val();
    if(flag==1){
      $("#WinWrapper3").show();
    } 
  })
  $("#qyqd").click(function(){
    if(tid>0){
      $.post('/plus/zt/index.php?model=dingyue&f=delete',{'tid':tid},function(data){
          if(data==-2){//Î´µÇÂ¼
            json_api_login_form();
            return false;
          }else if(data==0){
            alert("¸ÃÀ¸Ä¿Î´¿ªÆô¶©ÔÄ¹¦ÄÜ");
            $("#WinWrapper3").hide();
            return false;
          }else if(data==-1){
            alert("ÄúÉÐÎ´¶©ÔÄ¹ý¸ÃÀ¸Ä¿");
            $("#flag").val("-1");
            $("#dingyue").show();
            $("#qxdy").hide();
            $("#WinWrapper3").hide();
            return false;
          }else if(data==-4){
            alert("´íÎóµÄ²ÎÊý");
            $("#WinWrapper3").hide();
            return false;
          }else{
            alert("È¡Ïû¶©ÔÄ³É¹¦");
            $("#flag").val("-1");
            $("#dingyue").show();
            $("#qxdy").hide();
            $("#WinWrapper3").hide();
          }
        })
      
    }
  })
  //Çå³ýËùÓÐ
  function clearAll(){
    //$("#qxdy").remove();
      $("#dingyue").remove();
      $("#WinWrapper1").remove();
      $("#WinWrapper2").remove();
      $("#WinWrapper3").remove();
  }
  //¶©ÔÄ³É¹¦
  $("#dysuccess").click(function(){
    //clearAll();
  $("#WinWrapper2").hide();
  $("#flag").val("1");
    $("#dingyue").hide();
    $("#qxdy").show();
    $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
  }) 
</script>

function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle){
    try { window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);}
    catch (e) 
    { 
        try { window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, ""); } 
        catch (e) { alert("¼ÓÈëÊÕ²ØÊ§°Ü£¬ÇëÊ¹ÓÃCtrl+D½øÐÐÌí¼Ó"); } 
    } 
    return false;
}

	<script type="text/javascript">
	//»ñÈ¡µ±Ç°ÎÄÕÂËùÔÚÀ¸Ä¿ÊÇ·ñ¾ßÓÐ¶©ÔÄ¹¦ÄÜ
    var tid=4054;
  $(function(){
    flag();
    
  })
  //»ñÈ¡×´Ì¬
  function flag(){
  
  if(tid!=0){
      $.get('/plus/zt/index.php?model=dingyue&f=flag',{'tid':tid},function(data){
        if(data==0){//Î´¿ªÆô
          clearAll();
        }

        if(data==1){//ÒÑ¶©ÔÄ
          $("#qxdy").show();
        }
        if(data==-1 || data==-2){//Î´¶©ÔÄ or Î´µÇÂ¼
          $("#dingyue").show();
        }

        $("#flag").val(data);
      })
    }else{//Î´¿ªÆô
      clearAll();
    }
  }
  $("#dingyue").click(function(){
    var flag=$("#flag").val();
    if(flag==-1 || flag==-2){
      //ÅÐ¶ÏÊÇ·ñµÇÂ¼
      $.get('/plus/zt/index.php?model=dingyue&f=clickdy',function(data){
        if(data!=-2){//ÒÑµÇÂ¼
      $("#email").val(data);
          $("#WinWrapper1").show();
        }else{
          json_api_login_form();
          return false;
        }
      })
      
    } 
  })
  
  //¶©ÔÄÌá½»
  $("#dyqd").click(function(){
    //»ñÈ¡tid
    if(tid>0){
      //»ñÈ¡email²¢ÑéÖ¤¸ñÊ½
      var reg =/^([a-zA-Z0-9_\.])+@([a-zA-Z0-9_-])+(\.([a-zA-Z0-9_]+))+$/;
      var email=$("#email").val();
    
      if(email!="" && email.length<=50 && reg.test(email)){
        var url=window.location.href;
        $.post('/plus/zt/index.php?model=dingyue&f=add',{'tid':tid,'email':email,'url':url},function(data){
        if(data==-2){//Î´µÇÂ¼
          json_api_login_form();
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else if(data==0){
          alert("¸ÃÀ¸Ä¿Î´¿ªÆô¶©ÔÄ¹¦ÄÜ");
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else if(data==-1){
          alert("ÄúÒÑ¾­¶©ÔÄ¹ý¸ÃÀ¸Ä¿");
          $("#flag").val("1");
          $("#dingyue").hide();
          $("#qxdy").show();
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else if(data==-3){
          alert("ÓÊÏäÒÑÔÚµ±Ç°À¸Ä¿Ê¹ÓÃ¹ý");
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else if(data==-4){
          alert("´íÎóµÄ²ÎÊý");
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
          return false;
        }else{
          $("#WinWrapper2").show();
          $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
        }
      })
      }else{
        alert("ÇëÌîÐ´ÕýÈ·µÄÓÊÏäµØÖ·");
        return false;
      }
    }
  })
  //È¡Ïû¶©ÔÄ
  $("#qxdy").click(function(){
    var flag=$("#flag").val();
    if(flag==1){
      $("#WinWrapper3").show();
    } 
  })
  $("#qyqd").click(function(){
    if(tid>0){
      $.post('/plus/zt/index.php?model=dingyue&f=delete',{'tid':tid},function(data){
          if(data==-2){//Î´µÇÂ¼
            json_api_login_form();
            return false;
          }else if(data==0){
            alert("¸ÃÀ¸Ä¿Î´¿ªÆô¶©ÔÄ¹¦ÄÜ");
            $("#WinWrapper3").hide();
            return false;
          }else if(data==-1){
            alert("ÄúÉÐÎ´¶©ÔÄ¹ý¸ÃÀ¸Ä¿");
            $("#flag").val("-1");
            $("#dingyue").show();
            $("#qxdy").hide();
            $("#WinWrapper3").hide();
            return false;
          }else if(data==-4){
            alert("´íÎóµÄ²ÎÊý");
            $("#WinWrapper3").hide();
            return false;
          }else{
            alert("È¡Ïû¶©ÔÄ³É¹¦");
            $("#flag").val("-1");
            $("#dingyue").show();
            $("#qxdy").hide();
            $("#WinWrapper3").hide();
          }
        })
      
    }
  })
  //Çå³ýËùÓÐ
  function clearAll(){
    //$("#qxdy").remove();
      $("#dingyue").remove();
      $("#WinWrapper1").remove();
      $("#WinWrapper2").remove();
      $("#WinWrapper3").remove();
  }
  //¶©ÔÄ³É¹¦
  $("#dysuccess").click(function(){
    //clearAll();
  $("#WinWrapper2").hide();
  $("#flag").val("1");
    $("#dingyue").hide();
    $("#qxdy").show();
    $("#WinWrapper1").hide();
  })

$(function(){
    var flag;
    $("a.a4,.head16_nav").hover(function(){
        clearTimeout(flag);
        $(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '299px'}, "fast");

    },function(){
        $('a.a4').css('background-position', '-124px 0');
        flag = setTimeout(function(){
    		$(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '0px'}, "fast");
        },100);
    });
});

function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle){
    try { window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);}
    catch (e) 
    { 
        try { window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, ""); } 
        catch (e) { alert("¼ÓÈëÊÕ²ØÊ§°Ü£¬ÇëÊ¹ÓÃCtrl+D½øÐÐÌí¼Ó"); } 
    } 
    return false;
}

}

}

		<script>
            $(function(){
                var lazyheight = 0;
                //°ó¶¨ÊÂ¼þ
                $(window).bind("scroll", function(){
                    lazyheight = parseFloat($(window).height()) + parseFloat($(window).scrollTop());
                    //ÓÒ²à¸ß¶È
                    var rightDivHeight = $("#rightDiv").height();
                    /**ÏòÏÂ¹ö¶¯*/
                    if ($(document).height()-200-parseFloat($(".includeGlobalFoot").height()) <= lazyheight) {
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_fixed");
                        $("#rightDiv").addClass("side_abso");
                    }
                    //´°¿Ú¸ß¶È ´óÓÚ ÓÒ²à ¸ß¶ÈÊ± ÓÒ²àÍ£Ö¹
                    else if(lazyheight > 100+rightDivHeight) {
                        //alert('ÓÒ²àÍ£Ö¹¹ö¶¯');
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_abso");
                        $("#rightDiv").addClass("side_fixed");
                    }
                    else if(parseFloat($(window).scrollTop()) <= parseFloat($("#rightDiv").height())-parseFloat($(window).height())+100) {
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_abso");
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_fixed");
                    }
                });
            })
            function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle) {
                try {
                    window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);
                } catch (e) {
                    try {
                        window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, "");
                    } catch (e) {
                        alert("ÄúµÄä¯ÀÀÆ÷²»Ö§³ÖÒ»¼üÊÕ²Ø£¬Çë°´Ctrl+D½«±¾Ò³Ìí¼Óµ½ÊÕ²Ø¼Ð");
                    }
                }
            }


            function myswitch(t,b,id,len){
                for(i=1;i<=len;i++){
                    document.getElementById(t+"_"+i).className='';
                    document.getElementById(b+"_"+i).style.display='none';
                }
                document.getElementById(t+"_"+id).className='current ';
                document.getElementById(b+"_"+id).style.display='';
            }
            $('.showFocus li').mouseover(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').show();
                return false;
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').hide();
                return false;
            })
            $('.new15Theme li').mouseover(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').show();
                return false;
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').hide();
                return false;

<script>
//µ÷È¡µ±Ç°ÓÎÏ·½ñÌìµÄËùÓÐ¿ª·þ
				$.getJSON('http://kf.07073.com/kfapi/kf_interface/gameBoxKfList/?callback=?', {'name_id' : 42381}, function (data) {
			        var ing = '', not = '', yes='', will='',limit=4;
			        if(data.kfIng != ""){
			        	ing=data.kfIng;
			        }
			        if(data.kfNot != ""){
			        	not=data.kfNot;
			        }
			        if(data.kfYes != ""){//ÒÑ¾­¿ª·þ
			        	yes=data.kfYes;
			        }
			        if(data.kfWill != ""){//Á½¸öÐ¡Ê±Ö®ºóµÄÒÔºóµÄ¿ª·þ
			        	will=data.kfWill;
			        }
			        var hb="";
			        if(ing!=""){
			        	for (var i in ing) {
			        		if(i>3){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = ing[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				            hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            i++;
				        }
			        }

			        var los=limit-ing.length;
			        //console.log(los);
			        if(not!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in not) {
				            if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = not[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }
			        if(yes!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in yes) {
				            if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = yes[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }
			        if(will!="" && los>0){
			        	for (var i in will) {
			        		if(los<1){
			        			break;
			        		}
				            info = will[i];
				            //var stime=timeformat(info.begin_time_timestamp)+' '+info.begin_time;
				            var stime='½ñÈÕ '+info.begin_time;
				           	hb+='<div class="kf_box"><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td class="icon"><span></span></td><td align="left" width="80">'+stime+'</td><td align="center" width="90"><div>'+info.servername+'</div></td><td align="center" width="100"><div>'+info.thread+'</div></td><td align="center"><a target="_blank" href="http://kf.07073.com/kfinfo/kfgo/'+info.id+'?f=zq">½øÈë</a></td></tr></table></div>';
				            los--;
				        }
			        }

			        if(hb.length==0){
			        	$("#indexkf").hide();
			        }else{
			        	$(".kf_main").html(hb);
			        }
			    })



function timeformat(timeStr)
{
var tim =  new Date(parseInt(timeStr) * 1000); //Èç¹ûÊ±¼ä´ÁÊÇºó¶ËÉú³É Òª * 1000
var year = tim.getFullYear(); //Äê
var month = tim.getMonth() + 1; //ÔÂ
month = month < 10 ? '0' + month : month;
var day = tim.getDate();//ÈÕ
day = day < 10 ? '0' + day : day;
var h = tim.getHours()+1;
h = h < 10 ? '0' + h : h;
var mm = tim.getMinutes()+1;
mm = mm < 10 ? '0' + mm : mm;
var s = tim.getSeconds()+1;
s = s < 10 ? '0' + s : s;
str=month+'-'+day;
return str;
}
	</script>

        ba1_index = 2;
        page_size = 8;
		var show_all = 0;
        $('#ba1').click(function(){
          ba1_num = $('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').length;     
          if(!show_all){
			$('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').show();
			$('#ba1 > img').attr('src', 'http://m1.073img.com/_12img/typeC/arrow_up.png');
			show_all = 1;
          } else {
			$('#daShow_1 > dl[isshow="1"]').slice(ba1_index*page_size).hide();
			$('#ba1 > img').attr('src', 'http://m1.073img.com/_12img/typeC/arrow.png');
			show_all = 0;
          }
        });

		
        $('.thisSelectByType a').click(function(){
          type = $(this).parent().attr('rel');
          expr = type+':'+$(this).html();
          $('#daShow_1 > dl').attr('isshow','').hide();
        
          $(this).parent().find('a').removeClass('current');
          $(this).addClass('current');
          //´¦Àí¶àÌõ¼þ
          multi_expr = 'dl';
          $('.thisSelectByType dl').each(function(){
              sexpr = $(this).find("a[class='current']").html();
              if(sexpr != 'È«²¿'){
                  stype = $(this).find('dd').attr('rel');
                  multi_expr += "[rel*='"+stype+":'][rel*='"+sexpr+"']";
              }
          });
          //console.log(multi_expr);
          $('#daShow_1').find(multi_expr).attr('isshow','1');
          
          //´¦Àí·ÖÒ³
          if($('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').length>16){
              $('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').slice(0,16).show();
              $('div.arrow').show();
          } else {
              $('#daShow_1 dl[isshow="1"]').show();
              $('div.arrow').hide();
          }
        });

<script>
	var isLogin = 0;
	var typeid = '42381';
	$.get('/plus/typec_serv.php?action=load_game_state&typeid='+typeid,function(data){
		data = eval('('+data+')');

		if(data.kf>0){
			$('.link_01').html('<a class="this_bgimg a2" href="http://kf.07073.com/g_'+typeid+'/?f=zq" target="_blank">¿ª·þ</a>');
		}
	});
	function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle)
	{
		if(!isLogin){
			json_api_login_form();
			return false;
		}
		try
		{
			var d = document;
			var ta=d.createElement("script");
			ta.type="text/javascript";
			ta.id="fav";
			ta.setAttribute("charset","gb2312");
			ta.src="http://ui1.07073.com/api/fav_game/"+typeid;
			d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(ta);
			window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);
		} catch (e) {
			try {
				window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, "");
			} catch (e) {
				alert("ÄúµÄä¯ÀÀÆ÷²»Ö§³ÖÒ»¼üÊÕ²Ø£¬Çë°´Ctrl+D½«±¾Ò³Ìí¼Óµ½ÊÕ²Ø¼Ð.");
			}
		}
	}

	function funcName(flag){
		if(flag == 1){
			isLogin = 1;
		}else{
			isLogin = 0;
		}
	}
</script>

							jQuery(".tabWrap").slide({

	function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle)
	{
		if(!isLogin){
			json_api_login_form();
			return false;
		}
		try
		{
			var d = document;
			var ta=d.createElement("script");
			ta.type="text/javascript";
			ta.id="fav";
			ta.setAttribute("charset","gb2312");
			ta.src="http://ui1.07073.com/api/fav_game/"+typeid;
			d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(ta);
			window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);
		} catch (e) {
			try {
				window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, "");
			} catch (e) {
				alert("ÄúµÄä¯ÀÀÆ÷²»Ö§³ÖÒ»¼üÊÕ²Ø£¬Çë°´Ctrl+D½«±¾Ò³Ìí¼Óµ½ÊÕ²Ø¼Ð.");
			}
		}
	}

	function funcName(flag){
		if(flag == 1){
			isLogin = 1;
		}else{
			isLogin = 0;
		}
	}
</script>

    var flag;
    $("a.a4,.head16_nav").hover(function(){
        clearTimeout(flag);
        $(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '299px'}, "fast");

        $('a.a4').css('background-position', '-124px 0');

        },100);
    });

function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle){
    try { window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);}
    catch (e) 
    { 
        try { window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, ""); } 
        catch (e) { alert("¼ÓÈëÊÕ²ØÊ§°Ü£¬ÇëÊ¹ÓÃCtrl+D½øÐÐÌí¼Ó"); } 
    } 
    return false;
}

}

	$_sso.show_login_form();
}

		<script>
            $(function(){
                var lazyheight = 0;
                //°ó¶¨ÊÂ¼þ
                $(window).bind("scroll", function(){
                    lazyheight = parseFloat($(window).height()) + parseFloat($(window).scrollTop());
                    //ÓÒ²à¸ß¶È
                    var rightDivHeight = $("#rightDiv").height();
                    /**ÏòÏÂ¹ö¶¯*/
                    if ($(document).height()-200-parseFloat($(".includeGlobalFoot").height()) <= lazyheight) {
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_fixed");
                        $("#rightDiv").addClass("side_abso");
                    }
                    //´°¿Ú¸ß¶È ´óÓÚ ÓÒ²à ¸ß¶ÈÊ± ÓÒ²àÍ£Ö¹
                    else if(lazyheight > 100+rightDivHeight) {
                        //alert('ÓÒ²àÍ£Ö¹¹ö¶¯');
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_abso");
                        $("#rightDiv").addClass("side_fixed");
                    }
                    else if(parseFloat($(window).scrollTop()) <= parseFloat($("#rightDiv").height())-parseFloat($(window).height())+100) {
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_abso");
                        $("#rightDiv").removeClass("side_fixed");
                    }
                });
            })
            function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle) {
                try {
                    window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);
                } catch (e) {
                    try {
                        window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, "");
                    } catch (e) {
                        alert("ÄúµÄä¯ÀÀÆ÷²»Ö§³ÖÒ»¼üÊÕ²Ø£¬Çë°´Ctrl+D½«±¾Ò³Ìí¼Óµ½ÊÕ²Ø¼Ð");
                    }
                }
            }


            function myswitch(t,b,id,len){
                for(i=1;i<=len;i++){
                    document.getElementById(t+"_"+i).className='';
                    document.getElementById(b+"_"+i).style.display='none';
                }
                document.getElementById(t+"_"+id).className='current ';
                document.getElementById(b+"_"+id).style.display='';
            }
            $('.showFocus li').mouseover(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').show();
                return false;
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').hide();
                return false;
            })
            $('.new15Theme li').mouseover(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').show();
                return false;
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(this).find('a>span').hide();
                return false;
            })
		</script>

<script>
  $(window).bind("scroll", function(){
	var xh=$(window).scrollTop();
	if(xh>700){
		$(".fd_div").fadeIn();
	 }else{
		$(".fd_div").fadeOut();
	}
  });
  function toPinglun(){
	document.getElementById('SOHUCS').scrollIntoView();
  }

$(function(){
    var flag;
    $("a.a4,.head16_nav").hover(function(){
        clearTimeout(flag);
        $(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '299px'}, "fast");
    	$('a.a4').css('background-position', '-124px -44px');

//加入收藏
function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle){
    try { window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);}
    catch (e) 
    { 
        try { window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, ""); } 
        catch (e) { alert("加入收藏失败，请使用Ctrl+D进行添加"); } 
    } 
    return false;
}

var $_sso = new SSO({anno_ele : '.head16_main' , anno_cell : '.head16_main_ul_div ul', anno_bigpic : '.head16_main_ul_div_img'});

function json_logout(){
	$_sso.logout();
}

function json_api_login_form(){
	$_sso.show_login_form();
}

<script type="text/javascript">
    var _reloadflag = 0;
    function login_call(flag, uid, username){
        if(_reloadflag==0){
            _reloadflag++;
        } else {
            var re = /^(.*?)storage(.*?)$/gi;
            var href = location.href;
            if( flag == 0 && re.test(href)) {
                location.href="//fahao.07073.com";
            } else {
                location.reload();
            }
        }
    }
    $_sso.set_callback(login_call);
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//¶¨ÒåÈ«¾Ö±äÁ¿
var Total = 8;
var _TasteArray = '';//³õ²½´æ´¢Ñ¡Ïî

$(document).ready(function($){
	
	$('.click_btn').click(function(){
		$('.thisBlackShadow').show();
		$('.thisBlackShadow').height($(document).height());
		$('.thisBigBoxing').slideDown(200);
	})

	$('.thisClose').click(function(){
		$('.thisBlackShadow').hide();
		$('.thisBigBoxing').slideUp(200);
	})
	//ÉÏÒ»Ò³  ÎªÁËÕûºÏÑ¡ÖÐÑùÊ½¸ÄÎªÕâÖÖ·½Ê½
	$('.thisPrevNext ul').on('click','#prePage',function(){
		var num = $(this).attr('data');//µ±Ç°ÏîË÷Òý
		if(num == 0){
			alert('ÒÑ¾­ÊÇµÚÒ»Ïî');
			return false;
		}else{
			var preNum = parseInt(num)-1;
			getItem(preNum);
		}
	});
	//ÏÂÒ»Ò³  ÎªÁËÕûºÏÑ¡ÖÐÑùÊ½¸ÄÎªÕâÖÖ·½Ê½
	$('.thisPrevNext ul').on('click','#nextPage',function(){
		var num = $(this).attr('data');//µ±Ç°ÏîË÷Òý
		if(num == parseInt(Total)-1){
			alert('ÒÑ¾­ÊÇ×îºóÒ»Ïî');
			return false;
		}else{
			var flag = false;
			$('.thisMain720').find('.selectBox ').find('.item_'+num).each(function(){
				var cur_class = $(this).find('a').attr('class');
				if(cur_class == 'current'){
					flag = true;
					return false;
				}
			});
			if(!flag){
				alert('ÕâµÀÌâÄú»¹ÊÇ×öÒ»¸öÑ¡Ôñ°É');
				return false;
			}else{
				var nextNum = parseInt(num)+1;
				getItem(nextNum);
			}
			
		}
	});
	//½»¾í ÎªÁËÕûºÏÑ¡ÖÐÑùÊ½¸ÄÎªÕâÖÖ·½Ê½
	$('.thisPrevNext ul').on('click','#subTest',function(){
		var num = $(this).attr('data');
		var flag = false;
		$('.item_'+num).each(function(){
			var cur_class = $(this).find('a').attr('class');
			if(cur_class == 'current'){
				flag = true;
				return false;
			}
		});
		if(!flag){
			alert('ÕâµÀÌâÄú»¹ÊÇ×öÒ»¸öÑ¡Ôñ°É');
			return false;
		}
		if(_TasteArray){
			$.ajax({
				 type: "POST",
				 url:  "http://zhao.07073.com/newgame/getTasteRes",
				 data: {check_items:_TasteArray},
				 dataType:'json',
				 success: function(data){
				   if(data.status == 1){
					   $('.thisMain720').html(data.msg);
					   $('.thisContents h3').html('²âÊÔ½á¹û');
					   $('.thisPrevNext ul .fr').html('<a href="javascript:;" id="resetPage">ÖØÐÂ²âÊÔ &gt;</a>');
				   }else{
					   alert(data.msg);
				   }
				 }
			  });
		}else{
			alert('ÇëÖÁÉÙ×öÒ»¸öÑ¡Ôñ£¬ÎÒÃÇ²ÅÄÜÖªµÀÄãÊÊºÏÄÄÐ©ÓÎÏ·');
		}
	});
	//ÖØÐÂ¿ªÊ¼
	$('.thisPrevNext ul').on('click','#resetPage',function(){
		getItem(0);
	});

	
});

//¼ÇÂ¼Ñ¡ÏîÖµ
function checkItem(cur_item,cur_num){
	$('.item_'+cur_num).find('dt a').each(function(){
		$(this).removeClass('current');
	});
	$(cur_item).addClass('current');
	var taste_tips = $(cur_item).parent().prev().html();
	if(_TasteArray == ''){
		_TasteArray += taste_tips;
	}else{
		_TasteArray += '@@'+taste_tips;
	}
	
}
function getItem(num_index){
	$.ajax({
		 type: "get",
		 url:  "http://zhao.07073.com/newgame/getTasteQues",
		 data: {p:num_index},
		 dataType:'json',
		 success: function(data){
		   if(data.status == 1){
			   var q = data.q;
			   $('.thisContents h3').html(q.gtitle);
			   $('.thisMain720').html(q.item);
			   $('.thisPrevNext ul').html(q.bottom);
			   $('.thisPages p').html(q.page);
		   }else{
			   alert(data.msg);
		   }
		}
	  });
}
//¿ªÊ¼²âÊÔ
function start(){
	$('.thisContents').show();
	$('#thisCover').hide();
	getItem(0);
}

</script>

$(function(){
    var flag;
    $("a.a4,.head16_nav").hover(function(){
        clearTimeout(flag);
        $(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '299px'}, "fast");
    	$('a.a4').css('background-position', '-124px -44px');
    },function(){
        $('a.a4').css('background-position', '-124px 0');
        flag = setTimeout(function(){
    		$(".head16_nav").stop().animate({height : '0px'}, "fast");
        },100);
    });
});
//¼ÓÈëÊÕ²Ø
function AddFavorite(sURL, sTitle){
    try { window.external.addFavorite(sURL, sTitle);}
    catch (e) 
    { 
        try { window.sidebar.addPanel(sTitle, sURL, ""); } 
        catch (e) { alert("¼ÓÈëÊÕ²ØÊ§°Ü£¬ÇëÊ¹ÓÃCtrl+D½øÐÐÌí¼Ó"); } 
    } 
    return false;
}

var $_sso = new SSO({anno_ele : '.head16_main' , anno_cell : '.head16_main_ul_div ul', anno_bigpic : '.head16_main_ul_div_img'});

function json_logout(){
	$_sso.logout();
}

function json_api_login_form(){
	$_sso.show_login_form();
}

<script type="text/javascript">
	var islogin = '';
	function _login(){
		json_api_login_form();return false;
	}
	function funcName(flag, userInfo){
		islogin = flag;
		if(!islogin){
			$('.xt2').bind('click', _login);
		}else{
			$('.xt2').unbind('click',_login);
		}
	}
	var _scroll_flag = true;//·ÀÖ¹¼ÓÔØÂýµ¼ÖÂµÄÊý¾ÝÖØ¸´
	function scrollEvent()
	{
		var a = arguments[0] ? arguments[0] : 0;
		var xh=$(window).scrollTop();
		
		if(xh>500){
			$(".tzss_1 a").fadeIn();
		 }else{
			$(".tzss_1 a").fadeOut();
		}
		
		if((xh >= $(document).height() - $(window).height() || a == 1) && _scroll_flag)
		{
			_scroll_flag = false;
			$(window).unbind('scroll',scrollEvent);
			var go_str = $('#pages a').attr('src');
			if(go_str.indexOf("?") == -1){
				var gourl = go_str;
			}else{
				go_str = go_str.match(/(.*)\?/).toString();
				go_arr = go_str.split(",");
				var gourl = go_arr[1];
			}
			var act = $('#act').val();
			var smtd = $('#smtd').val();
			var gname = $("input[name='gname']").val();
			gname = gname=='' || gname=='ÓÎÏ·Ãû³ÆËÑË÷' ? '':'&gname='+gname;
			var page = parseInt($('#curPage').val())+20;
			
			/* if(act == 'time' && smtd == 0){
				var page = $('.thisTimeGameList .timeLine').last().val();
			} */
			$('#loading').show();
			$.ajax({
				type: "get",
				dataType: "json",
				url: gourl,
				data: "reqs=1&act="+act+"&smtd="+smtd+gname+"&page="+page,
				success: function(data){
					if(smtd == 0){
						var add_postion = ".thisTimeGameList .gameListCont";
					}else{
						var add_postion = ".thisHotGameList";
					}
					$(add_postion).append(data.html);
					$('#curPage').val(data.curPage);
					if((data.nums < 20 && (data.smtd == 1 || data.smtd == 0 && data.act == 'hot') || data.status == 0) ){
						$('#loading').hide();
						$(window).unbind('scroll',scrollEvent);	
					}
					else{
						$(window).bind('scroll', scrollEvent);
					}						
					_scroll_flag = true;
				}
			});
		}			
	}		
	$(document).ready(function(){
		if(16 > 19 || ('hot' != 'hot' && 0 == 0)){
			$(window).bind('scroll', scrollEvent);
			$(".tzss_1 a").hide();
		}
		else{
			$('#loading').hide();
		}
	});
	function clear_check(){
		$('#cur_check').empty();
		window.location.href="http://zhao.07073.com/";
	}
	function GameOrderBy(parm){
		var str = "http://zhao.07073.com/0-0-0-41-0";
		if(str.indexOf("?") == -1){
			var new_url = str+"?act="+parm;
		}else{
			arr = str.match(/(.*)\?/).toString();
			arr = arr.split(",");
			var new_url = arr[1]+"?act="+parm+"&gname=&smtd=0";
		}
		window.location.href=new_url;
	}
	function showView(smtd){
		var method_str = "http://zhao.07073.com/0-0-0-41-0";
		if(method_str.indexOf("?") == -1){
			var new_url = method_str+"?smtd="+smtd;
		}else{
			arr = method_str.match(/(.*)\?/).toString();
			arr = arr.split(",");
			var new_url = arr[1]+"?act=hot&gname=&smtd="+smtd;
		}
		window.location.href=new_url;
	}
</script>

    <div class="popup dn" id="popup_favorite">
        <p>是否要收藏此游戏</p>
        <span>收藏后请到【用户中心 - 我的收藏】查看！</span>
        <div class="btn">
            <a class="delBtn" id="popup_favorite_add">收藏</a>
            <a class="cancelBtn" onclick="$('#popup_favorite,.mask').hide();">不收藏</a>
        </div>
        <div class="icon"><img src="https://img5.073img.com/h5/2018/pc/images/favorite.png" alt=""></div>
        <input id="my_favorite" name="my_favorite" type="hidden">
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
	var favorite_flag = false;
	var favorite_self;
	var favorite_game_id
	$('.favorite').click(function(){
				$('.mask').show();
		showGray('loginDiv');
				$('#popup_favorite,.mask').show();
		favorite_game_id = $(this).attr('data-id');
		$('#my_favorite').val(favorite_game_id);
		favorite_self = $(this);
	});

	$('#popup_favorite_add').click(function () {
		add_favorite(favorite_self, favorite_game_id);
	});

	function add_favorite(self, game_id) {
		if (true === favorite_flag) {
            return false;
        }
		favorite_flag = true;
		$.ajax({
            url: '/game/aj_favorite',
            data: {
            	game_id: game_id
            },
            type: 'post',
            dataType: 'json',
            cache: false,
            success: function(msg) {
            	favorite_flag = false;
                if (msg.errno == 100) {
                    $('#popup_favorite,.mask').hide();
                    if (msg.info.is_favorite) {
                        self.text('已收藏').attr('class', 'favorited');
                    }
                } else {
                	alert(msg.errstr);
                }
            }
        });
	}
    </script>
